text: This man was a little scatter-brained at times and the class was more lecture-based than most FHS classes, but we definitely read some interesting stuff and he is so knowledgeable. text: Juvenile delinquency is an interesting topic, but this course taught me nothing. It was mostly logic and people telling irrelevant personal stories. Grade is based only on two (annoying and long). It's an easy A and a seminar, but your time is better spent in other classes.
